audits.summary: Audit Round 3: 55 scripts, 15 directives, 11 skills — 45 fixes across 24 files

findings.summary: Extra quotes wrapping --include-industries value broke industry filter matching
findings.description: f'"{{industry_str}}"' produced literal quotes around pipe-separated industries — first/last never matched in filter.

findings.summary: build_combined_whitelist() missing " and "/" & " normalization variants
findings.description: Failed to match e.g. 'food and beverage services' vs 'food & beverage services'. Added both variants for V1 and V2 names.

findings.summary: Report generator received all 100 leads instead of top 3 best_leads
findings.description: Changed `leads` -> `best_leads` in report generator call.

findings.summary: OR->AND validation logic: lead matching ANY single criterion passed filter
findings.description: A lead matching ANY single criterion (title OR location) passed — now must match ALL specified categories. Same bug in scraper_peakydev.py.

findings.summary: OR->AND validation logic in PeakyDev scraper (same as CodeCrafter)
findings.description: Duplicate of CodeCrafter issue. Both backup scrapers inflated match percentages.

findings.summary: generate_lead_id() produces colliding hashes when business_name/address are None
findings.description: md5('none|none') collided for all leads with missing data. Added uuid fallback.

findings.summary: Used load_json() instead of load_leads() — no list type validation
Persisting filesystem-discovered placeholder campaign metadata to client.json
Silently discarding dedup failure result with _, _, _
isoformat() + 'Z' producing +00:00Z (double UTC marker)
Skip check (total < 10) placed after print() instead of before
before_dedup count not passed to export — 'After dedup' always equaled 'Total scraped'
main() duplicated inline auth instead of using shared _get_sheets_credentials()
34-line API response mapping duplicated verbatim in 200 OK and 429 handlers
Dead lead_map dict built in scraping step but never read back
Dead lead_map dict built in AI generation step but never read back
Dead lead_map dict in LinkedIn enricher never read back
id()-based mapping could theoretically collide if GC reclaims objects
findings.description: Replaced with index-based mapping: stores lead_index_map[id(lead)] = i at build time, maps enriched results by index.

findings.summary: Revenue mapping sends all buckets including >$1B for a $1M+ filter
findings.description: Now caps at min_rev * 100 when no upper bound.

findings.summary: source.lower() called after pre-normalized branch — pre-normalized path gets original case
sys.path.append instead of sys.path.insert(0) — wrong module could be imported
Truthy check discards legitimate 0 values for FCP, LCP, Speed Index
timeout=30 should be timeout=30.0 for Anthropic SDK (expects float/httpx.Timeout)
Sequential processing despite RateLimiter(50) — added ThreadPoolExecutor(5)
sys.stdout.reconfigure() missing errors='replace' — crashes on non-UTF8 output
Template variables all assigned from groups[0] instead of contextual regex groups
pop() mutating shared endpoint dicts — use filtered copy instead
Column letter calculation wrong for >26 columns (wrong divmod approach)
error_handler.py is dead code — only imported by archived orchestrator
findings.description: Moved to execution/_archived/

findings.summary: apollo_to_apify_mapper.py is dead code — only imported by archived orchestrator
findings.description: Moved to execution/_archived/

findings.summary: Wrong filenames in usage docstrings (2 scripts)
findings.description: ai_icebreaker_generator.py and website_scraper.py had wrong filenames in usage strings.

findings.summary: 8 nonexistent script references in enrich_icebreakers.md workflow section
Nonexistent --exclude-campaigns flag referenced in cross_campaign_deduplication.md
Missing required args in orchestrator example (--apollo-url, --max-leads, --client-id)
Wrong step references (3,6 -> 5,9 for V8 pipeline)
Wrong default workers count (3 -> 10)
Skill description says 'extract website contacts' instead of 'evaluate websites (PageSpeed)'
Outdated 'Apollo V4' section in client_management.md — replaced with V8 orchestrator
Wrong output filename pattern in enrich_linkedin_profile.md (static -> timestamp)

audits.summary: Audit Round 4: Full system review — bugs, discrepancies, design gaps

findings.summary: RateLimiter.acquire() sleeps inside lock — serializes all threads
findings.fix_description: Compute next-allowed time under lock, release lock, THEN sleep outside

findings.summary: Operator precedence: ternary binds to entire or-chain in first_name fallback
findings.fix_description: Added parentheses to isolate ternary: (name.split()[0] if name else '')

findings.summary: Empty created_at sorts filesystem-discovered campaigns first as baseline
findings.fix_description: Changed sort key fallback to '9999' for missing created_at

findings.summary: Cookie exit_code lost in parallel scraper results dict
findings.fix_description: Added exit_code to parallel results dict, used in cookie check

findings.summary: Substring country matching: nz matches Linz, uk matches Vanusku
Direct dict access business[website] instead of .get()
Email-less leads always classified as removed in human filter analysis
findings.fix_description: Added name+company fallback matching for email-less leads

findings.summary: Wrong CLI flag --max-leads documented (actual: --target-leads)
Cookie failure protocol incompatible with V8 parallel design
findings.fix_description: Rewrote cookie protocol for V8 parallel design

findings.summary: Hardcoded techstart references instead of {client_id} placeholders
ai_lead_enricher skip logic appears inverted (intentional, added comment)
cold_email_exporter: empty emails list causes IndexError
company_country_enricher: per-thread sleep instead of shared RateLimiter
findings.fix_description: Replaced per-thread sleep with shared RateLimiter from utils

findings.summary: ai_icebreaker_generator: unsynchronized writes to shared scraping_errors_log
email_enricher: division by zero if elapsed_time is 0
findings.fix_description: Added division by zero guard: if elapsed_time > 0 else 0

findings.summary: email_verifier: division by zero if elapsed_time is 0
findings.fix_description: Added division by zero guard: if elapsed_time > 0 else 0

findings.summary: extract_website_contacts: fragile JSON extraction misses code blocks
findings.fix_description: Two-pass extraction: look for ```json code blocks first

findings.summary: client_discovery: generate_client_id crashes on non-Latin company names
findings.fix_description: Added fallback: try domain extraction, then md5 hash

findings.summary: generate_sales_sample: hardcoded max_leads=100 overrides MAX_SAMPLE_LEADS
findings.fix_description: Changed default to None, uses MAX_SAMPLE_LEADS constant

findings.summary: client_manager: isoformat()+Z produces double UTC marker +00:00Z
fast_lead_orchestrator: campaign entries missing status field
findings.fix_description: Added status: in_progress/completed to campaign entries

findings.summary: cross_campaign_deduplicator: non-timestamped backups risk overwriting
post_scrape_filter: industries not enforced despite support check
findings.fix_description: Added filter_by_industry() and industries dispatch in enforce_filters()

findings.summary: google_sheets_exporter: mode=create ignores provided sheet_id
gmaps_lead_generation.md: wrong worker defaults (3 vs 10)
cross_campaign_deduplication.md: wrong --campaigns syntax
cross_campaign_deduplication.md: outdated 14-step workflow (now 9-step V8)
PROMPTS.md missing /system-audit in All Commands table
linkedin_enricher: hardcoded 60s sleep ignoring Retry-After header
website_evaluator: SSL verification disabled (verify=False)
website_evaluator: linear O(n) stagger grows unbounded with worker count
findings.fix_description: Changed to fixed per-task delay instead of linear stagger

findings.summary: gmaps_scored_pipeline: tab cleanup deletes ALL tabs, not just pipeline-created
findings.fix_description: Only delete tabs prefixed with email_

findings.summary: scrape_gmaps_contact: no timeout on Apify actor call (can hang)
name_diacritics_fixer: multi-part name split defaults to wrong surname pos
cleanup_and_enrich_leads: hardcoded precast concrete icebreakers
findings.fix_description: Removed hardcoded precast concrete references, made generic

findings.summary: ai_industry_enricher: scrape failures retried with exponential backoff
findings.fix_description: Scrape failures (network issues) now fail fast, only AI errors retry

findings.summary: Claude model version drift: 5 files use old claude-3-haiku-20240307
Duplicate normalize_key() in filter_new_leads.py and cross_campaign_deduplicator.py
findings.fix_description: Moved normalize_key() to utils.py, both files now import from utils

findings.summary: lead_filter.py: redundant Counter reimport as _Counter
findings.fix_description: Removed redundant local import, uses module-level Counter

findings.summary: Raw json.dump/load in ai_casual_name_generator.py
Raw json.dump/load in ai_fallback_enricher.py
Raw json.dump/load in ai_icebreaker_generator.py
Raw json.dump/load in ai_industry_enricher.py
Raw json.dump/load in email_enricher.py
Raw json.dump/load in email_verifier.py
Raw json.dump/load in linkedin_enricher.py
Raw json.dump/load in company_country_enricher.py
Raw json.dump/load in ai_lead_enricher.py
Raw json.dump in verify_country.py
Raw json.dump in scraper_olympus_b2b_finder.py
audit_logger + changelog_manager missing Windows console UTF-8 fix
findings.fix_description: Added Windows console UTF-8 reconfigure block

findings.summary: normalize_key() needed in utils.py for cross-file consolidation
scraper_olympus: unnecessary organization_name fallback (field never exists)
findings.fix_description: Kept as-is (harmless fallback, not worth removing)

findings.summary: lead_quality_analyzer: organization_name fallback never matched
findings.fix_description: Kept as-is (harmless fallback, not worth removing)

audits.summary: Audit Round 5: Full system review post-Round 4 fixes

findings.summary: Backup file naming .backup_TIMESTAMP vs .backup. filter mismatch
findings.description: save_campaign_leads() created .backup_TIMESTAMP.json but load_campaign_leads() filtered with '.backup.' not in name. Backup files were being picked up as lead files.

findings.summary: No try/except around future.result() in ThreadPoolExecutor loop
findings.description: If any enrichment thread threw an exception, future.result() would propagate it and crash the entire script.

findings.summary: Missing sys.path setup for sibling imports
findings.description: from scrape_google_maps import scrape_google_maps would fail when script is run from root directory.

findings.summary: ValueError on non-numeric revenue string in int() conversion
findings.description: int(revenue.get('min', 0)) crashes if revenue value is a float string like '1000000.0' or non-numeric.

findings.summary: Wrong pipeline step references (pre-V8) in quality filtering directive
findings.description: Referenced 'Step 5 to Step 9' but V8 pipeline has quality filtering at Step 7.

findings.summary: Directives reference --max-leads instead of --target-leads for orchestrator
findings.description: enrich_icebreakers.md and client_management.md used --max-leads for fast_lead_orchestrator.py which uses --target-leads.

findings.summary: Dead lead_map variable: created and updated but never read
findings.description: lead_map dict was built by id() and updated in thread loop but never used. Leads are mutated in-place.

findings.summary: Google Sheets rows can contain Python None values crashing API
findings.description: Row values from .get() could be None if field was explicitly set to None. Sheets API rejects non-string values.

findings.summary: Hard import openai/anthropic without try/except in optional functions
findings.description: _call_openai() and _call_anthropic() did bare imports that crash with ModuleNotFoundError if packages not installed.

findings.summary: normalize_pre_normalized() uses organization_phone ignoring company_phone
findings.description: Pre-normalized leads with company_phone (canonical) were mapped from organization_phone (legacy), losing the canonical field.

findings.summary: ConnectionError fails immediately without retry unlike Timeout/429
findings.description: Timeout and 429 errors had retry+backoff but ConnectionError returned immediately. Transient network issues need retries.

findings.summary: Duplicate normalize_key() local definition (should import from utils)
findings.description: Local normalize_key() was identical to utils.normalize_key(). Should import from utils like other scripts.

findings.summary: name.split()[0] crashes on whitespace-only names
findings.description: If name is whitespace-only string, name.split() returns [] and [0] raises IndexError. Also no fallback for empty first_name in greeting.

findings.summary: Summary prints after-dedup count as 'Total scraped'
findings.description: Final summary showed len(all_leads) (post-dedup) as 'Total scraped' instead of before_dedup count. Sheets export correctly used before_dedup.

findings.summary: Audit Round 5 LOW investigation: no unused imports, all markers present, raw json intentional
findings.description: Systematic check of unused imports, file markers, raw json.dump calls, backoff comments, field name mismatches — all clean. No LOW bugs found.

audits.summary: Audit Round 6: Full system review post-Round 5 fixes

findings.summary: changelog_manager.py: no validation on summary param — None/non-string crashes [:120] slice
ai_icebreaker_generator.py: rate_limiter.acquire() before precondition check wastes rate limit slots
changelog_manager.py/audit_logger.py: corrupted JSON crashes load — no JSONDecodeError handling
fast_lead_orchestrator.py: manual .strip().lower() instead of normalize_key() for email dedup
apollo_url_builder.py: hex ID regex rejects uppercase hex chars (Apollo uses mixed case)
lead_splitter.py: emails field checked with len() but could be non-list type causing TypeError
generate_sales_sample.py: reads .env file directly instead of using load_dotenv/os.getenv
ai_industry_enricher.py: 4 error paths missing industry_source field causing KeyError downstream
changelog.json: audit entry 20260226_075041_005 missing severity field
cold_email_copywriting.md: email_copywriter.py references need NOT YET IMPLEMENTED notices
changelog.json: entry summary truncated mid-word by 120-char limit — cosmetic
audit_logger.py: import json needed for JSONDecodeError but was missing

audits.summary: Audit Round 7: deep cross-file logic, edge cases, consistency gaps

findings.summary: fast_lead_orchestrator.py: missing normalize_key import — REGRESSION from Round 6 fix
APOLLO_COOKIE regex requires newline inside brackets, fails on single-line format (4 files)
apollo_url_builder _is_hex_id crashes on None input — no type guard
linkedin_enricher overwrites existing enrichment fields with empty strings on re-run
google_sheets_exporter silently skips junk leads without logging; 'Actor' false positive
find_latest_lead_file called without after_timestamp — stale file risk on re-runs (3 locations)
lead_filter industry inclusion whitelist keeps unclassified leads instead of excluding them
Enricher timestamp inconsistency: 4 files use naive datetime, 2 use UTC
industry_relevance_filter silently returns empty dict on JSON parse failure — no error logging
ai_lead_enricher overwrites higher-quality industry without checking existing value

audits.summary: Audit Round 8: deep logic, cross-file consistency, edge cases post-R7 fixes

findings.summary: fast_lead_orchestrator: 4 find_latest_lead_file calls missing after_timestamp (lines 698,734,752,761)
gmaps_scored_pipeline: header 'mobile_friendly' but code reads 'is_mobile_friendly' — empty column
findings.fix_description: Changed header to is_mobile_friendly to match field name

audits.summary: Audit Round 9: final sweep — verify all prior fixes, catch any remaining issues
Audit Round 9 (Final): Verification sweep — all fixes confirmed, no new bugs found
